quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Movie and Allie
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, john, notebook. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: In the movie, The Notebook, Noah is occasionally shown as an old man, who does what to help Allie overcome her medical condition?

options.text: Take her on a boat ride
Take her back to their house

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Read a story to her

questions.question: In the 2004 film, The Notebook, Noah decides to do something insane to grab Allie’s attention. What does he do to make Ally agree to go on a date with him?

options.text: He lays down in the middle of the street and refuses to get up.
He uses a friend of his to arrange a date with Allie at the movies.
He stops the Ferris wheel and keeps her up with him until she agrees to go out with him.
He jumps onto the Ferris wheel and hangs from the bars until she agrees to go out with him.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: He jumps onto the Ferris wheel and hangs from the bars until she agrees to go out with him.

questions.question: In the movie, Allies parents take her away in order to separate her from Noah. What else does Allies mother do to keep the young lovers apart?

options.text: She threatens Noah and forces him to leave the country.
She hides the letters Noah sends to Allie.
She tells Allie that Noah was killed in the war.
She finds a fiance for Ally.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: She hides the letters Noah sends to Allie.

questions.question: In the movie The Notebook, when Allies mother comes and takes Allie from Noahs house, the two have a talk as a result of which Allie finds out what?

options.text: Her mother had the same impossible love when she was young.
Her mother intends to leave her father for her first love.
Her mother does not love her father anymore.
Her mother has been unfaithful to her father.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Her mother had the same impossible love when she was young.

questions.question: The movie, The Notebook is a love story, where an elderly man reads bits and pieces of a love story of two young lovers, to his female companion. It later becomes apparent that the female companion is in fact Allie, who is now suffering from what disease?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Alzheimers Disease

questions.question: In the movie, when the already grown-up Allie is just about to leave Noahs house, he asks her to come the next day because he has something to show her. Where does he take her when she comes back in the morning?

options.text: To the movie they watched 7 years ago.
On a walk along the street they lay on together 7 years ago.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: On a boat ride.

questions.question: In this movie, John Wayne played the sheriff of a small town, who has to hold in jail the brother of a powerful rancher. The movie was directed by Howard Hawks.

options.text: The Man Who Shot Liberty Valance

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Rio Bravo

questions.question: Which one of these pairs actor - western movie he has played in is wrong?

options.text: Liam Dunn - The Mark of Zorro

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Liam Dunn - The Mark of Zorro

questions.question: Toward the end of this movie, the sheriff and a gang of train robbers are shooting at each other on a moving train.  Stuntman Bob Morgan was playing one of the robbers, when suddenly the chains holding some logs together snapped and he was crushed. Morgan was badly injured and almost died.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: How the West Was Won

questions.question: Blazing Saddles was a comedy western about  the first Black sheriff in the west. Do you know who played the role of Sheriff Bart?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Cleavon Little

questions.question: El Dorado stars actors such as James Caan, Robert Mitchum and John Wayne. Shooting of the movie started in late 1965 with the release following in this year.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: 1967

questions.question: In the movie version of The Notebook, while Noah fights in World War II in Europe, his father does something that fascinates and deeply moves Noah. What is it?

options.text: His father contacts Allie and tells her about the letters Noah has been sending.
His father sells the house so Noah can buy the one he had always wanted.
His father wins a lot of money gambling and sends them to Allie.
His father finds a fiancee for Noah.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: His father sells the house so Noah can buy the one he had always wanted.

questions.question: The Oscar-winning movie Dances With Wolves ran over budget and Kevin Costner was forced to make up the overages personally.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: In a scene from The Notebook, Allie suddenly experiences a great shock and faints for what reason?

options.text: She sees Noahs picture in front of their dream house in the newspaper.
She sees Noah with his neighbor, Martha.
Noah shows up in the middle of her wedding.
Her mother reveals to her that she had been hiding the letters Noah wrote.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: She sees Noahs picture in front of their dream house in the newspaper.

questions.question: Young Noah Calhoun, a character from the movie The Notebook, is instantly smitten with seventeen-year-old Allie Hamilton, when he spots her at a carnival. What is the first thing Noah says to Allie?

options.text: Would you like to go out with me?
Would you like to ride with me on the Ferris Wheel?
Would you like to go for a walk?

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Would you like to dance?

quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Movie and Line

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Big Lebowski

questions.question: In which film did the main character have to get rid of his vices such as smoking, drinking, gambling in order to inherit a large sum of cash?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Easy Money

options.text: The Man Who Knew Too Much

questions.question: What was the name of the high school in the movie Porkys which Pee Wee and the other boys attended?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Angel Beach

questions.question: The all-pro defensive tackle from the Detroit Lions, Alex Karras, played the role of Porky in the 1982 film Porkys.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: False

questions.question: Name the movie which featured the following tag line: Girls like me dont make invitations like this to just anyone!
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Pulp Fiction

questions.question: Which movie features With great power comes great responsibility. as a tag line?

questions.question: Which movie was the following tag line used to promote: Up is down, black is white, and nothing is what it seems?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Millers Crossing

questions.question: The Fight for the Future Begins was the tag line for which movie?

options.text: Lord Of The Rings : Return Of The King

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Matrix

questions.question: Which movie is the following tag line from: EARTH Take a good look. It could be your last.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Independence Day

questions.question: Does for rock and roll what The Sound of Music did for hills is the tag line from which movie?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: This Is Spinal Tap

questions.question: What happens on the quay in the movie The Notebook, when Allie and Noah return from the boat ride in the heavy rain?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Noah Kisses Allie.

questions.question: A new- and altogether different- screen excitement!!! is the tag line from which movie?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Psycho

questions.question: Which movie is the following tag line from:  Fear can hold you prisoner. Hope can set you free.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Shawshank Redemption

questions.question: The setting is a campfire. Gathered around are Captain America, Billy, and the lawyer, George Hanson.  The lawyer looks around and says, Nic-nic-nic. What cult movie are you watching?

quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Movie and Sweet Home Alabama

questions.question: A great dog-hater, this villain ranked # 39 on AFI’s list of the 50 top villains, is one of the three from the list coming from an animated film.

options.text: The Wicked Witch of the West

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Cruella De Vil

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Auric Goldfinger

questions.question: A fierce eating machine, this creature is one of the few non-humans to appear on AFI’s list of the top movie villains, at # 18.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Shark from Jaws

questions.question: In the romantic comedy Sweet Home Alabama, who is the young talented actress that plays the small part of the young Melanie Smooter?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Dakota Fanning

questions.question: What do the villains from the War of the Worlds, ranked #27 on the AFIs list of the 50 top villains, have in common with the villain at #14 from the same list?

options.text: They both come from outer space.

questions.question: This villain from a 1989 movie is at # 45 in the American Film Institute’s list of the 50 most memorable movie villains.

questions.question: In the movie Sweet Home Alabama, what problem does the character Malanie Smooter encounter, which prevents her from marrying her fiance Andrew Hennings?

options.text: Andrews mother wants him to wait.
It rains on the wedding day.
Her parents will not give their approval.
She is still married to Jake.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: She is still married to Jake.

questions.question: This villain was chosen for position # 33 on the AFI’s list of the top movie villains. He has been in many movies but his appearance in a 1931 movie is regarded as the most memorable.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Count Dracula

questions.question: For her role in the movie Sweet Home Alabama, Reese Witherspoon won the Teen Choice Awards for what category?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Choice liplock
